Description:
Detects the use of TruffleSnout.exe an iterative AD discovery toolkit for offensive operators, situational awareness and targeted low noise enumeration.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - TruffleSnout Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where original_file_name = 'trufflesnout.exe' and process_path like '%\trufflesnout.exe'
